author: Llhweiir
title: Great for beginners
review:
Bought this set for my 3 year old kid who demanded "small-Lego" for christmas. He finds Duplo to limited, and wanted to have the same kind of Lego as his older cousins.

In my opinion it  is a great set for beginner. You can build quite a large number of different houses and/or cars withou being to complicated. In addition it has a great cost/piece-ratio.

author: yerdna
title: Very nice for LEGO starters
review:
This is a very nice set to start your child's lego collection with. You get two figures and a very, very nice instruction book with lots of models. You can build a post office, a police headquarters and a general store and two vehicles simultaneously! True, the buildings feeature only a fassade and are by far not so complex as those in the Lego City series but they're good suited for a beginner.
The set does not contain many special or rare parts (the post box as the only exclusion).
